===Trial===
===Trial===
  +
[[File:Mubarak is now playing the VICTIM!.gif|thumb|Mubarak ''(Sticking his finger up his nose)'' playing the victim during his trail.]]
{{split section|Trial of Hosni Mubarak|Talk:Hosni_Mubarak#Trial_of_Hosni_Mubarak|date=August 2011}}
{{split section|Trial of Hosni Mubarak|Talk:Hosni_Mubarak#Trial_of_Hosni_Mubarak|date=August 2011}}
  +
{{more|Trials and judicial hearings following the 2011 Egyptian revolution#Mubarak_family}}
  +
On 24 May 2011, Mubarak was ordered to stand trial on charges of [[premeditated murder]] of peaceful protestors during the 2011 Egyptian revolution and, if convicted, could face the [[death penalty]]. The decision to try Mubarak was made days before a scheduled protest in Tahir Square. The full list of charges released by the public prosecutor was "intentional murder, attempted killing of some demonstrators...misuse of influence and deliberately wasting public funds and unlawfully making private financial gains and profits."<ref name="reutersmurdercharges"/>
On 24 May 2011, Mubarak was ordered to stand trial on charges of [[premeditated murder]] of peaceful protestors during the 2011 Egyptian revolution and, if convicted, could face the [[death penalty]]. The decision to try Mubarak was made days before a scheduled protest in Tahir Square. The full list of charges released by the public prosecutor was "intentional murder, attempted killing of some demonstrators...misuse of influence and deliberately wasting public funds and unlawfully making private financial gains and profits."<ref name="reutersmurdercharges"/>
